SELECT * FROM article WHERE displayStatus = 1 AND delStatus = 0 AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} , '%') ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{limitFrom}, #{itemsInAPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article WHERE displayStatus = 1 AND delStatus = 0 AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} , '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article WHERE displayStatus = 1 AND delStatus = 0
